p: Mosquitoes use temperature as a seasonal cue, and along with photoperiodic cues, these have been used to model their seasonal activity. For temperate strains of exotic species, like A. albopictus, models, developed by MEZE and others, have assessed areas for establishment and seasonal activity in the event of an importation, 60, 61 thus providing an insight into possible areas for nuisance biting and to target surveillance.
